sections.title: Verse 1
content: He guides me along the right path;
He is true to His name.
If I should walk in the valley of darkness,
You are there with Your crook and Your staff,
With these You give me comfort.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: You have prepared a banquet for me
In the sight of my foes.
My head You have anointed with oil;

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Surely goodness and kindness shall follow me
All the days of my life.
In the Lordâ€™s own house shall I dwell
